homeHeroTitle: Welcome to this part of the internet! where ugly fonts rule and we go by no UX approved standards.
homeHeroSubtitleAnswer: I'm Federico Werner Budtke, a software engineer from Argentina.
homeHeroSitePurposeAnswer: A small personal homepage made to comply with my need to have a personal site.
homeHeroTechStackAnswer: This site is built with React, TanStack Router, TypeScript, Vite, TailwindCSS and DaisyUI.
homeHeroBonusQuestion: BONUS QUESTION: WHY NOT AN ACCORDION?
homeHeroBonusAnswer: Because accordions are meant to play music, not to be used in UIs.
